name: Jeremy Lindblom
tagline: Software Architect at McGraw-Hill Education. I â™¥ PHP
body:
### Hello, I'm Jeremy!

I'm a software architect at [McGraw-Hill Education](http://www.mheducation.com/), living in Phoenix, Arizona. My areas of focus at work include interoperability in education technology (particularly [LTI](https://www.imsglobal.org/activity/learning-tools-interoperability)); API design, development, and documentation; and the development of our LMS software and other digital platforms.

I love working with PHP, and I help organize the local [Arizona PHP User Group](http://www.meetup.com/azPHPUG/) ([@azphp](https://twitter.com/azphp)). In the past, I worked at [Amazon Web Services](https://aws.amazon.com/) in Seattle, Washington, where I worked on the [AWS SDK for PHP](https://aws.amazon.com/sdk-for-php/). While there, I founded the [Pacific Northwest PHP Conference]() ([@PNWPHP](https://twitter.com/pnwphp)), as co-organizer of the [Seattle PHP User Group](http://www.meetup.com/seaphp/) ([@SeaPHP](https://twitter.com/seaphp)). I have also spoken at various PHP conference around the US.

### Connect With Me

* [@jeremeamia on Twitter](https://twitter.com/jeremeamia)
* [@jeremeamia on GitHub](https://github.com/jeremeamia)
* [Jeremy Lindblom on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jeremylindblom)
